verses.verse: לְדָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid, of David מִ֫זְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor A Psalm לַֽ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [is] the LORD'S הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz The earth וּמְלוֹאָ֑הּ <S%H4393><s%> u-me-lo-'Ah; and the fulness תֵּ֝בֵ֗ל <S%H8398><s%> te-Vel, thereof the world וְיֹ֣שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> ve-Yo-she-vei and they that dwell בָֽהּ׃ Vah.

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for ה֭וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon יַמִּ֣ים <S%H3220><s%> yam-Mim it upon the seas יְסָדָ֑הּ <S%H3245><s%> ye-sa-Dah; For he hath founded וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- upon נְ֝הָר֗וֹת <S%H5104><s%> ne-ha-Rot, it upon the floods יְכוֹנְנֶֽהָ׃ <S%H3559><s%> ye-chon-Ne-ha. and established

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Who יַעֲלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Leh Who shall ascend בְהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> ve-har- into the hill יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; Jehovah וּמִי־ <S%H4310><s%> u-mi- Who יָ֝קוּם <S%H6965><s%> Ya-kum may stand בִּמְק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> bim-Kom country קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6944><s%> ka-de-Sho. in his holy

נְקִ֥י <S%H5355><s%> ne-Ki He that hath clean כַפַּ֗יִם <S%H3709><s%> chap-Pa-yim, hands וּֽבַר־ <S%H1249><s%> u-var- and a pure לֵ֫בָ֥ב <S%H3824><s%> le-Vav heart אֲשֶׁ֤ר׀ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- has not נָשָׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> na-Sa who hath not lifted up לַשָּׁ֣וְא <S%H7723><s%> lash-Shav unto vanity נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; his soul וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not נִשְׁבַּ֣ע <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' nor sworn לְמִרְמָֽה׃ <S%H4820><s%> le-mir-Mah. deceitfully

יִשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> yis-Sa He shall receive בְ֭רָכָה <S%H1293><s%> Ve-ra-chah the blessing מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; from the LORD וּ֝צְדָקָ֗ה <S%H6666><s%> u-tze-da-Kah, and righteousness מֵאֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> me-'e-lo-Hei from the God יִשְׁעֽוֹ׃ <S%H3468><s%> yish-'O. of his salvation

זֶ֭ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh This דּ֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> Dor This [is] the generation; דֹּרְשֹׁו do-re-shov כדֹּרְשָׁ֑יו <S%H1875><s%> do-re-Shav; ask קמְבַקְשֵׁ֨י <S%H1245><s%> me-vak-Shei him that seek פָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nei-cha thy face יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko O Jacob סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

שְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> se-'U Lift up שְׁעָרִ֨ים׀ <S%H8179><s%> she-'a-Rim O ye gates רָֽאשֵׁיכֶ֗ם <S%H7218><s%> ra-shei-Chem, your heads וְֽ֭הִנָּשְׂאוּ <S%H5375><s%> Ve-hin-na-se-'u and be ye lift up פִּתְחֵ֣י <S%H6607><s%> pit-Chei doors עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam; ye everlasting וְ֝יָב֗וֹא <S%H935><s%> ve-ya-Vo, shall come in מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech and the King הַכָּבֽוֹד׃ <S%H3519><s%> hak-ka-Vod. of glory

מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who זֶה֮ <S%H2088><s%> zeh he מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech Who [is] this King הַכָּ֫ב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> hak-Ka-Vod glorious יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD עִזּ֣וּז <S%H5808><s%> 'iz-Zuz strong וְגִבּ֑וֹר <S%H1368><s%> ve-gib-Bor; and mighty יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD גִּבּ֥וֹר <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bor mighty מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mah. in battle

שְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> se-'U Lift up שְׁעָרִ֨ים׀ <S%H8179><s%> she-'a-Rim O ye gates רָֽאשֵׁיכֶ֗ם <S%H7218><s%> ra-shei-Chem, your heads וּ֭שְׂאוּ <S%H5375><s%> U-se-'u even lift [them] up פִּתְחֵ֣י <S%H6607><s%> pit-Chei doors עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam; ye everlasting וְ֝יָבֹא <S%H935><s%> Ve-ya-vo shall come in מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech and the King הַכָּבֽוֹד׃ <S%H3519><s%> hak-ka-Vod. of glory

מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he זֶה֮ <S%H2088><s%> zeh is this מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech Who is this King הַכָּ֫ב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> hak-Ka-Vod of glory יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Jehovah צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot; of hosts ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu He מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech he [is] the King הַכָּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> hak-ka-Vod of glory סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah
